subtests.name: Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / should fail when the mapping is to an empty array
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Exact vs. prefix based matching / should match correctly when both are in the map
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Exact vs. prefix based matching / should match correctly when only an exact match is in the map
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Exact vs. prefix based matching / should match correctly when only a prefix match is in the map
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Package-like scenarios / should resolve scoped
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Package-like scenarios / should apply best scope match
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Package-like scenarios / should fallback to "imports"
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Package-like scenarios / should still fail for package-like specifiers that are not declared
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / The scope inheritance example from the README / should fall back to "imports" when none match
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / The scope inheritance example from the README / should use a direct scope override
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / The scope inheritance example from the README / should use an indirect scope override
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Relative URL scope keys / should resolve an empty string scope using the import map URL
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Relative URL scope keys / should resolve a ./ scope using the import map URL's directory
Mapped using scope instead of "imports" / Relative URL scope keys / should resolve a ../ scope using the import map URL's directory
